attributes.action: Pressure NATO to enforce a 'No Fly Zone' above Ukraine!
attributes.background: Russian aircraft appear to be deliberately targeting civilians and hospitals in Ukraine. Enforcing a 'No Fly Zone' over Ukraine will stop this and allow civilians to leave or a better chance of surviving the war and essential services like hospitals can be better protected.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437
